title: [Large-scale] Resource-based Learning Design for Developing 4th-grade Elementary Language Education Materials

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational language education theory, instructional design methodologies, and elementary education curricula
context.additional_context: Emphasizing practical competencies for workplace language material development, focusing on digital resource creation applicable to smartphone-based learning environments

learning_goals: They can accurately describe (over 80%) the process of developing language education materials for 4th-grade elementary students according to resource-based learning principles
They can create two or more learning material prototypes (drafts) by applying a 10-stage developmental research methodology
They can systematically improve materials through expert validation (content/media/instructional design) and field testing procedures
They can design three types of digital learning resources (quizzes/videos/activity sheets) usable in smartphone environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
